name: noise-machine
description: A simple white noise / soothing noise machine.

scripts.build: browserify index.js -t babelify -t [ riotify --type es6 ] --debug --outfile bundle.js
scripts.build:dist: browserify index.js -t babelify -t [ riotify --type es6 ] | uglifyjs - | bundle-collapser - > bundle.min.js
scripts.watch: watchify -v --debug -t babelify -t [ riotify --type es6 ] index.js -o bundle.js

author: Daniel Mikusa <dan@mikusa.com>
